item.title: Musing
item.description: 🍵 Jun 4, 2021 “The Answer to the Great Question… Of Life, the Universe and Everything… Is… Forty-two.” said Deep Thought, with infinite majesty and calm. — Douglas Adams, The Hitchhiker’s Guide to the Galaxy 🍵 May 27, 2020 “Because it’s the thought of Mecca that keeps me alive. That’s what helps me face these days that are all the same, these mute crystals on the shelves, and lunch and dinner at that same horrible cafe.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m currently a Software Engineer at Zalo working as a backend engineer. I studied Computer Science at the Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology. I have a thrist for knowledge and learning new things. Feel free to drop me a message if you want to know more about me. 😜 Personal I love making new friends with people around the world 📬; photography 📷; reading books 📚; playing the piano 🎹; running 🏃; inline skating 🛼
